website_summaries.verdict: Natural, versatile, inexpensive, and effective at calming most dogs in many situations – a good deal for pet lovers' best friends and their budgets.
pros: An affordable option that combines natural oils for soothing aromatherapy
Scent is also pleasant to humans
Easy to use, and can be paired with other calming products
Comes in choice of pump spray or dropper applicator
cons: Won't calm all dogs, and may not work well in majorly stressful situations like severe storms

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend the spray and the jacket together for anyones dog who has anxiety like mine!
customer_reviews.text: I have a purebred German Shepherd and she's about a year and a half. She's always gone wild when I'm away, (tearing the couch up, cords, etc.) she has severe separation anxiety. We purchased the thunder shirt itself as well as the thunder essence. All you have to do is put the jacket on (replicates a hug, not too warm for the dog either) and spray 2-3 spritz of the spray. Together they work wonders!!! I leave it in her while I'm away and she quit shredding all my things! The spray smells like fresh lavender and she immediately calms to the smell. It's not too overwhelming! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND for any dog parents out there, 100% worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The results were amazing. 2 small sprays onto his bandanna calmed him ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually bother writing reviews but writing one for this product - gotta do it! I have a small dog that is very timid & fearful for any loud noise or change in his routine. Thunderstorms totally freak him out & he can sense them coming several hours prior. He has a thunder shirt which is helpful. I saw this product & decided to try it as a supplement. WOW! The results were amazing. 2 small sprays onto his bandanna calmed him down & he was completely relaxed. I no longer have to watch my dog shake & whine with no real way to help him. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sue M. Zablocki

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell, no effect.
customer_reviews.text: This did nothing for our crazy dog but it does smell nice! Made me feel calm.
customer_reviews.author: K. Reich

customer_reviews.title: Thunder Essence 4oz spray
customer_reviews.text: My anxious rescue dog really relaxes when I spray her coat. I use it when we leave the house. I know it works because we have used it on her when company comes to the house. She is much more mellow. I give it an A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Mary Magee-Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love the ThunderEssence Spray
customer_reviews.text: I love the ThunderEssence Spray! I apply it with her ThunderShirt or just on her body (I spray on my hands and rub over her body). She seems to enjoy it, and it has definitely helped relax her when things get crazy with all our grandkids here. It also smells great and it's like a 'breath of fresh air' on her body.
customer_reviews.author: Debie Jo Lusk Danna

customer_reviews.title: Calming help!
customer_reviews.text: This ThunderEssence spray is a great addition to the Thundershirts that we use on our two mini schnauzers, during thunderstorms and fireworks. It seems we end up getting unending fireworks from mid May - the end of summer. Has made a big difference with our two dogs. They used to shake and whine uncontrollably during storms or fireworks. Now they actually curl up and fall asleep at times. Also the spray has a very pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: shopperjill

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: My black lab / rottweiler is scared crazy over thunder and also fireworks and gun shots. Being a rescue I do not know what her previous life was like. I do know that your product does seem to help calm her some. I just wish it acted more quickly as I don’t know when the noises will occur and it takes about 15 minutes before I see any effect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped our dog to be more calm during storms
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is very afraid of thunderstorms. We bought the thunder shirt but he still shook, we bought the spray hoping it would help. It seems to have, he only shakes when the thunder is very close and loud. The panting and pacing have stopped completely. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: We have one older pug that was having a lot of anxiety at night. We tried a night light and soft sounds. They helped but didn't stop her from waking up howling at 3 or 4 am. I spray her crate with this every few nights and when I put fresh blankets and bed in her crate. It has really made a difference. She still wakes us up every once in a while but nowhere near as often as it was happening. Plus it smells nice!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer123

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the ThunderShirt
customer_reviews.text: We have a 14 year old Yellow Lab that has terrible anxiety during thunderstorms. She would incessantly pace back and forth while heavily panting. I've put the ThunderShirt on her several times over the past year immediately after a storm starts, sprayed several blasts of the ThunderEase ThunderEssence on the little black patch near the front, and it's like a magic switch. She completely calms down and ignores the storm. At her age, we worried about the additional stress of thunderstorms and fireworks, not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B.

customer_reviews.title: It has a really nice scent but don’t spray too much the first time ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on our recused mini dauchshound. We use it on his bed and his sleep spot on the couch when he’s feeling nervous. It has a really nice scent but don’t spray too much the first time like I did. We had a small gathering and it calmed him right down. We got complimented on the nice smell in our house but it relaxed some of them so much that half our party was taking a nap! LOL Needless to say I would buy this again and again. Great product for dogs and stressed humans it seems.
customer_reviews.author: MJK1021

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, seems to help
customer_reviews.text: I have a husky rescue with horrible separation anxiety. we just made a 1000 mile move and he is having a hard time adjusting to new surroundings, This stuff seems to help keep him calm during the day while I'm at work. I use this on both my dogs actually because it smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Deerwester

customer_reviews.title: Helps calm anxious dog during storm
customer_reviews.text: Our elderly dog grows more anxious with age and thunder storms are a recipe for hours of pacing, panting and crying. We used the ThunderShirt for a while, but it's lost its effect. I've had the opportunity to use the spray about 10 times for her. While it doesn't completely calm her, it definitely takes the edge off. Good for a short storm or if I start to see her getting anxious at bedtime. I think it helps break the cycle of anxiety somewhat. It's a bonus that the scent is nice and not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Covered In Dog Hair

customer_reviews.title: Worked well during fireworks
customer_reviews.text: Worked well keeping our dog calm during the neighbors’ mini-Armageddon on the 4th, especially considering that I forgot to apply it in advance. I sprayed it on my palms and stroked it from the top of her head to her shoulders, then down her ears and underneath her chin and down her throat. I also VERY lightly misted her bed. She settled down quickly and dozed until they finished (about an hour and a half). I was amazed, frankly, and have recommended it to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: SetterLovr

customer_reviews.title: Mellow potion
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm my very hyper Rat Terrier calmed down till she is completely mellowed out. Not calm enough to cut nails but calm enough to lay on her back for 20mins
customer_reviews.author: Tiesha CJ

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My little dog is on the hyperactive side and he isn't neutered. We moved to a new home and he's been spraying literally every box and container. My sister recommended this type of product since it helps with her male cats. It definitely helps calm him. He's now confined his marking to certain areas and when I put the spray on him or near him, it seems to mellow him out. I don't personally enjoy the scent but I do enjoy the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love using this on the Thundershirt for our 12 year old border collie. Smells lovely, and used with the shirt, he is as Zen as can be now during storms that used to leave him shaking like a leaf. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ms Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Okay :)
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would smell like lavender but it smells mostly like Egyptian geranium. It is a very strong sent. I took a star off because the packaging is very poor. When my package arrived the bottle had loosed itself from its cardboard box and was floating around a large cardboard box with very little to keep it from spilling all over my other items. I have noticed that other people have had a similar complaint. I really can’t tell if this product does anything to my dog at all but I know that I always spray his bedding before I put them in his crate for the night. At the very least it keeps in smelling pretty.
customer_reviews.author: lexie

customer_reviews.title: Seems to Help
customer_reviews.text: I spritz 3 sprays on the spot indicated on the thundershirt. My dog is pretty scared of thunder - even loud rain freaks him out. With his thundershirt, he usually either paces the house or tucks himself in the bathroom or a closet. Today I used the spray and he actually laid in the dog bed. He was still scared and very alert to the thunder outside, but I think this is a marked improvement. The storm that rolled in wasn't the worst storm we've had, so I will update when a more severe thunderstorm occurs and test it then.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I'll never be without this!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 white shepherds. The male is oblivious to just about everything, but the females freak at the first sign of a storm or fire crackers. I can't believe how great this works!! I just spray it on their backs. They seem to love it. Frankly, it soothes me too. The fragrance has a peacefulness about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Bought This
customer_reviews.text: My dog is pretty much afraid of everything all the time so I'm glad to say this product seemed to help him. I sprayed it on his car seat before we took off in the morning and on his bed at night. I don't think any product could totally relax him, but this one gave him at least 10% relief and I'm grateful for that.
customer_reviews.author: merrywv

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a 65lb PitBull who is so scared of thunderstorms that she crawls into the closet or hides wherever she can. I bought this spray and sprayed it on her ThunderShirt and around the sofa that she lays on and I was amazed how calm she became. The storm passed and she was still a little scared but nothing like before. This works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Chaelotte

customer_reviews.title: Works well in combination with other products to calm my 3 dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs freak out when they hear fireworks, and during thunderstorms. They can hear thunder before we do. This spray doesn't have much of an effect on my big dogs when used by itself, but when I use it along with their thundershirts, give them calming treats, and use a diffuser, the combination seems to do the trick. (None of those items work by themselves for my pups) I spray it on their thundershirts, and on their beds. This product may work well alone for smaller dogs (mine are all over 60 lbs) or dogs that don't have as much anxiety, but for my big babies... I gotta use all 4 calming products to get them to calm down.
customer_reviews.author: JAN

customer_reviews.title: It helps an overly anxious dog
customer_reviews.text: It works quite well for my blind girl when she's upset. My monster male however is hit and miss. We had a whopping thunderstorm last night and I pretty much soaked his back with it. That took him from 100 anxiety points to about 60. I then sprayed the area under my desk where he finally chose to hide and it took him down to about 40 points. After that we were able to work on commands. I think we'd really need a chloroform spritz for him.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great for any anxious dog.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps calm my little dog, she is ultra sensitive with sounds. Thunder and fireworks are the worst. I spray in her crate . I also use it on her thunder shirt and and another brand mellow shirt. I use these along with a white noise machine in the bedroom. She seems much calmer and safe in her crate.
customer_reviews.author: kjdf

customer_reviews.title: Seller doesn’t take returns on a misguided/non-working product
customer_reviews.text: 1 star because it smells ok, rather put 0-it’s basically an air freshener!!! Has NO CALMING EFFECT WHATSOEVER!!!!! And the seller doesn’t take returns-who does that? Don’t waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: 4th of july firework hell
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for pre fourth of july bracing for my dogs to start barking nonstop, shake, and try to hide. Well it was a horrible fourth of july months but it did help my dogs i would have to switch it out because it was nightly for about a month of fireworks. I noticed my dog going to sleep with the scent and since she wasn't roudy an running back and forth my other one calmed down as well. The smell is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Maria S. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Undecided but think it helps
customer_reviews.text: I won’t swear to it but I think it does help my dogs on some... they are crazy in monsoon season and I had to make several changes when my shih tzu was missing over twenty four hours after breaking out when I am not home. I do know the mellow shirt makes a difference, I think this makes an additional difference. It smells good to me so I don’t mind using.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Smells great & seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog with separation anxiety. I have tried so many products to help calm her while I'm away. I love the smell of this spray. Not sure it really works to calm her, but seems to & definitely doesn't hurt. I spray her bed & blankets in her cage before putting her in. She settles down before I leave now so I'm thinking it's because of the lavender. I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Judi D.

customer_reviews.title: So wish I had a better report!
customer_reviews.text: Was very hopeful about this product as I use essential oils for myself. I has a pleasant fragrance but unfortunately did nothing to help calm our dog. We live in an area of the country where thunder and lightening are frequent weekly events in the summer, and our dog exhibits all the signs of stress ... trembling, panting, hiding. Cannot say the spray helped at all. So wish I had a better report!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: GREAT-can I use it for myself :-)
customer_reviews.text: This helps my yorkie so much during storms. I once sprayed it on the area that's indicated on her Thunder-jacket... It knocked both of us out. I think that was the best sleep I've gotten in a LONG TIME. It's not strong, but she jumped up on my bed and must've rubbed on my pillow. Before I knew it, we both were out until the next morning...during the storm.
customer_reviews.author: EDemontJ

customer_reviews.title: Combined with the thunder shirt, this did help my ...
customer_reviews.text: Combined with the thunder shirt, this did help my dog to relax. She didn’t stop barking completely but she didn’t seem as anxious.
customer_reviews.author: cruzinsanjose

customer_reviews.title: Thunder Essence
customer_reviews.text: My dog is horrible in the car. The spray really helped ! I put it on a bandana tied around his neck. Give it to them about 30 minutes before the trip. My dog was much improved. Calmer and quieter. He is 8 years old so long history of bad car riding habits.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This did absolutely NOTHING I got it to put on Thunder shirt which also did absolutely NOTHING I followed directions and nothing helped Wasted so much money on both items..
customer_reviews.author: Shnookie04

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd calming product that I have bought. it is the best. My Yorkie was sleeping through a thunder storm which has never happened before.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Ruest

customer_reviews.title: Calming spray
customer_reviews.text: I have a Aussie that is terrified of thunder and fire works and gets very anxious. She has a thunder jacket and the spay helps her relax
customer_reviews.author: glennh

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a hard time this year especially during covid + fourth of July. I feel like since everyone was home, fireworks were going off wayyy more than necessary this year. My dog especially hated it but what could we do.. This calming spray + a thunder jacket seemed to really help her!!!! Grateful to have found this product
customer_reviews.author: Monica W

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing negative to say about this product. Few sprays in pup’s kennel before naps and bedtime. Very calming.
customer_reviews.author: SylMedici

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if if calms my puppy or not
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell if this spray calms my dog at all. I bought it to help him feel calm when in the car and going to new places like the vet. He is 9mo and has a lot of energy though. Maybe if he was older it would be more noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Works on our one year old husky pup that doesn't like to be left alone. We put this on her thunder shirt, then put that on her and it calms her down.
customer_reviews.author: EASchmidtE

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Although the scent is nice, it doesn't work. It's a waste of money if you ask me. I could have just bought some wax melts and got the same scent.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to meds and shirt
customer_reviews.text: Love this product vs medication. I use on a toy that my senior pup sleeps with or goes in the car
customer_reviews.author: InishPony

customer_reviews.title: works sometimes
customer_reviews.text: For my dog she doesn't like the smell, my friends dogs seem to like it and calm down. It smells nice to me.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Use with Thunderjacket
customer_reviews.text: We sprayed liberal amounts of this on my pup's Thunderjacket and it help the jacket work better. Much more calmer for 4th of July and when we go out to dinner. Anxiety levels were cut down dramatically. Can cause drowsiness.
customer_reviews.author: cg, california

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as pheromone spray
customer_reviews.text: More product, lower price, nicer smell than pheromone spray, and just as effective. Scent is light floral/herbal. Can also spray right on dog, according to label, so puppy smells good for a day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item with the thunder shirt. I have a large dog and this along with a thunder jacket has made a huge difference in his anxiety with storms. Great purchase would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Snyder

customer_reviews.title: I use it too!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I even use it on myself... lol ... does have a calming effect. a bit pricey thou. loose the box and reduce cost
customer_reviews.author: Alikat

customer_reviews.title: Product works!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product & have bought a few times already! Works quickly to calm our dogs down And we have small to large dogs, works for all of them. No side effects at all. Will always have this on hand in our home.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The product has a nice scent. It only takes a squirt or two to do the trick. Our dog is very afraid of thunderstorms. A quick spray or two rubbed into his fur calms him. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for calming and reducing anxiety in pups.
customer_reviews.text: This a wonderful calming essential spray for my pups. Every time we spray on their blankets, jackets, or their fur they calm or relax. They actually love it and lay down for it to let us know when they want it. They lay down right in front of their vest and spray draw.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Dea

customer_reviews.title: Epic Failure
customer_reviews.text: I was so hoping this would my two dogs with their terror of fireworks. Unfortunately it didn’t work. It didn’t seem to effect them at all.
customer_reviews.author: graham's mom

customer_reviews.title: Did not help at all
customer_reviews.text: Does not help at all when the dog is scared of loud noises, like fireworks and thunder.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and really helps to relax our dog. She had a really bad Fourth of July since the fireworks overwhelm her, but this product combined with the Thunder Shirt helps to soothe her when she gets anxious.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend. It helps my dogs relax for our weekly trip
customer_reviews.text: They don't like the smell when I first spray it. So I spray an hour before we leave, a half hour before we leave, and 15 minutes before we leave. They try to avoid the scent, but within 15 minutes they're quiet and relaxed.
customer_reviews.author: peggy reznicek

customer_reviews.title: It saved me
customer_reviews.text: My parents went away on vacation and my dog would not stop barking l every single night. I already had a thunder jacket, which helped but didn't fix the problem. So I bought this spray and overnighted it! I sprayed it on her bed, the couch, and by the front door. It took about 20 minutes for it to kick in but afterwards she settled down and went to sleep! She's a bit of an anxious pooch so I always have it handy.
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: No noticeable effect
customer_reviews.text: vs fear of thunder or fireworks on the thundershirt for our mini dachshund
customer_reviews.author: R. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Calms my dog quickly!
customer_reviews.text: My dog was having a hard time sleeping because of the firework explosions. I sprayed this on his bed and on his back and it really helped him relax. The smell is strong but it does not smell bad and it fades pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Artery30

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother...just another item for under the kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: Did not do anything. I was hoping it would do something, anything for my high anxiety German Shepherd girl, she has trouble settling down at night. NO DICE! Hate to say this BUT BIG WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: tracy doyle

customer_reviews.title: Loving the peace
customer_reviews.text: I thought I posted a review for this product I like it. My over anxious little Yorkie barks at literally any noise or movement it seems and she sets off my Chihuahua. Well that’s why I ordered it. Last night was heaven and tonight is pretty sweet too. They ate dinner and are already asleep. Thank you for creating this. My Chihuahua loves the taste my Yorkie eats it on food. Either way it works
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Herron

customer_reviews.title: Thunder essence spray
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Helps to calm your pet when they have anxiety issues.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells amazing like candy.. the pink starburst.. lol I didn’t nt get it for my dogs anxiety I just wanted something I could spray on her to keep her fresh.. this is it.. I will be buying faithfully
customer_reviews.author: montana daniel

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: If not for your dog even great for everyone. Lavender is very relaxing. Sometimes I spray it all in my room before I go to sleep, gives myself and dog great nights rest!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Changed instantly!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this stuff works great! I have a typical pomeranian. She barks at shadows! I just started a work from home position. The thunder essence was delivered about noon and it changed everything. She went from a yippie fool to a quiet angel. Love it. Recommend it. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Spurlock

customer_reviews.title: A must have for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Everyone with a dog must get👌🐾 calms them down. We use with thunder shirts and dogs were great in a 6 hour car ride and at a hotel for 3 days! Smells yummy and natural!
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Dog calming spray that helps with anxiety
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to help calm an anxious dog. It seems to help some. I spray a kerchief that we put around her neck. It does have a strong scent that lingers. One pump sprays plenty for one application.
customer_reviews.author: niksed

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS WELL!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders for our Shihtzu when it lightenings and thunders calms her immediately. One or two sprays on her neck shoulder area and she’s stops trembling almost immediatly. Was skeptical but really works. Wouldn’t be without this now.
customer_reviews.author: Gizimoto

customer_reviews.title: Gave up using it  its nasty smell
customer_reviews.text: They say it is not able to be smelled by humans. They are wrong. I can smell it very easily and its gross
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: Not for all dogs..
customer_reviews.text: This didnt do anything for the dogs other then make them sneeze when I sprayed it. I wa shopping it would calm the bark but didnt slow them down one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: May work for some dogs but not mine
customer_reviews.text: May work for some dogs but not mine or my trainers dog. My trainers uses it cuz she LOVES the scent, so that was worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Janae

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: my dog like this thunder calming spray better then her thunder jacket she is a 17 yer old yorkie we bought this to put on for the fireworks going off for fourth of july
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic item!!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to really calm our girl down along with the Thundershirt we bought - so glad we decided to get these!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Koltenuk

customer_reviews.title: It helped, I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helped calm and relax my 12 year old Bichon Frise. He is slot more calmed and relaxed.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: I used this for the first time today when it's thundering out
customer_reviews.text: both dogs are now sleeping, one under my desk the other not far from my chair, so I can say this does work.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Nice compliment with Thundershirt during storms
customer_reviews.text: Seems to help with calming my fur-baby during storms. I’ve only used it in conjunction with the Thundershirt. Next time will use separately.
customer_reviews.author: LCS

customer_reviews.title: smells good we will see if it helps overtime.
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and my moms chihuahua didn't mind it. Over time we will see if it helps calm my moms dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Grossberg

customer_reviews.title: Works as Described
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice and really does seem to relax my thunder-fearing poodle.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect to relax my little dogs when we've thunders and fireworks.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect to relax my little dogs when we've thunders and fireworks.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Moreno C.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Actually keeps my puppy calm. I spray him at night to help him sleep and it has been working like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: KMicole

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing every for my dog. He was so scared of thunder storms. This has calmed him down 75%. Would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Everett Martin

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but didn’t calm my puppy down
customer_reviews.text: Smells great but didn’t calm my puppy down. He’s like a toddler and nuts out before passing out, so maybe it will be better when he’s older.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Did not call my beast. He is a hunting hound! Xebo does, however, like to smell good. Added bonus - lavender repels fleas and ticks. Spritz myself to keep away mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try
customer_reviews.text: I can't say I saw a big difference. I'm still not comfortable reviewing this product fairly.
customer_reviews.author: shopalot

customer_reviews.title: NOT SURE IT IS WORKING!!!
customer_reviews.text: MY DOXIE WAS SPOOKED BY HEAVY EQUIPMENT ON STREET,this and calming collar is being Used,NOT SURE EITHER WORK!!!
customer_reviews.author: carmel Zein

customer_reviews.title: Thunderessence dog calming essential oil spray
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Calmed down my separation anxiety pup right away. I would recommend this to anyone experiencing anxiety ridden pups.
customer_reviews.author: Karolyn

customer_reviews.title: Works at times
customer_reviews.text: This spray works when my chihuahua wants it to work but will keep trying
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis B.

customer_reviews.title: Helps calm down my border collie mix
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and my dogs seem good with using it in conjunction with the thunder shirt
customer_reviews.author: Joey Bagodonuts

customer_reviews.title: Helps dogs and humans too!
customer_reviews.text: This a great tool for calming my rescue dog at bedtime. It also works great for his humans too.
customer_reviews.author: Mandalyon

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: Returned this product but the process was easy and service great.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't see any effect or benefit on my pom/papillon. Didn't calm or stop barking
customer_reviews.author: P. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and thunder shirt. Returned both. This did not work and had very little smell to it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Calms my dog down.
customer_reviews.text: I like this spray for my miniature poodle that is really afraid of sudden movements thunder,loud noises & strangers.It has a pleasant scent.I spray it on a bandana and put it on him. It really calms him down.
customer_reviews.author: Susan OHolla

customer_reviews.title: Love the sent
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, not sure it does any good. We are home most of the time and haven’t really needed it for its intended use but I love the sent and spray my dogs and crate bedding. For me this product has been a dog perfume lol 😂
customer_reviews.author: christina bell

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: This along with the thunder vest did nothing for tge anxiety my dog has during storms
customer_reviews.author: Stacia

customer_reviews.title: Used this and the thunder jacket helped with fireworks
customer_reviews.text: the fireworks were out of control this and the jacket helped my dog
customer_reviews.author: roger assmann

customer_reviews.title: Still testing
customer_reviews.text: While I do think it has decreased my dogs anxiety, I'm still going to try it a few more times to see if it actually did or not. When we're not in the car, I spray on my bed and she sleeps peacefully.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey B.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I only used it one time. It seemed to work. I plan to keep using it .
customer_reviews.author: J. Schmid

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us . . . .
customer_reviews.text: Fire works were rampant, in our neighborhood. Sprayed his bed. He laid down and went to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Smells awesome. But the dogs are not a fan of it and it didn't work to keep them calm. In fact my husky broke out of the kennel which was the first while I had this stuffed sprayed on him and in the kennel. This might work for some. I haven't found anything that works so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing for my terrified pup
customer_reviews.text: I hate to give bad reviews but this dude literally nothing to help my terrified dog. Nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works great to chill our dog out. She doesn’t seem so anxious when she has to be left in her crate
customer_reviews.author: S. Brassard

product_meta.title: ThunderEssence Dog Calming Essential Oils | All-Natural Lavender, Chamomile and Egyptian Geranium | Vet Recommended |4 FL OZ. Spray
feature_bullets: CALMING ESSENTIAL OILS: These oils have been specifically made for dogs to reduce anxiety and decrease stress at home, on vet visits, car and air travel, kennel stays and more.
SOOTHING AROMATHERAPY: All 100% natural blend of essential oils Lavender, Chamomile, and Egyptian Geranium that are paraben-free, dye-free, and cruelty-free.
VETERINARIAN RECOMMENDED: ThunderEssence is pH balanced and safe for dogs to use daily or as needed through all of life’s more difficult moments.
REDUCE ANXIETY: Pairs perfectly with a ThunderShirt for the ultimate day to day calm. ThunderEssence is available in a spray to be used as a mist or in drops for more concentrated use.

THUNDERWORKS IS COMMITTED to making affordable, effective, easy-to-use solutions for real problems faced by real pet families. Our Calming and Walking innovations create functional solutions for common pet problems.
